title: Fantastic Man - William Onyeabor Poster - FONT ID
content:
Looking for a font ID on this serif with swashes.

Many thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140314065136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1796819_612205355501525_278661442_o_5906.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1796819\_612205355501525\_278661442\_o.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140314065136/http:/typophile.com/files/1796819_612205355501525_278661442_o.jpg) | 198.47 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Looks like [Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140314065136/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Bookman) (Italic Swash). I strongly recommend you Mark Simonson's revival [Bookmania](http://web.archive.org/web/20140314065136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania) full of wonderful alternate swash letters which, after further inspection, may match your sample.
